Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Sometimes some simple questions are more convenient and quick to ask the AI, but lack some accuracy compared to asking the teacher.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: The feedback the AI gave me was only some logic or format problems, but the feedback the teacher gave me was more academic and professional.
